messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a whoop of rodents have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of [REDACTED] have descended into the maintenance tunnels.
